property.name: Text
property.value: Response: play after you win a power challenge. Attach this card to a non-unique character with a printed cost of 3 or lower controlled by the losing opponent and take control of that character and all attachments on that character. Persuasion then remains in play as a condition attachment on that character. Persuasion may not be played on a character with the No Attachments keyword.

property.name: Text

property.value: You may only initiate Military challenges this round.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
